title: Tariff Ruling Lifts Emerging Assets as BlackRock ETF Hits Record
description: Emerging-market assets got a boost after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs, with currencies erasing weekly losses and an exchange-traded fund hitting a record high.
content: Emerging-market assets got a boost after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs, with currencies erasing weekly losses and an exchange-traded fund hitting a record high.
